cons:
Very intense manual labour, taxing on the body - despite your level of fitness. 
Early morning starts - 6am. Can be tough when working consecutive mornings, especially with some early nights. 
If you don't get along with your fellow staff at work, you're forced to either reconcile with them or deal with - its a close proximity working environment, and on a nine hour shift, you're reliant on each other for tasks.
Full time contracts are hard to obtain unless you are in management.
